title: S on Tryndamere and no token?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Don't you get a token to level up mastery every time you get an S? If so Im owned a Tryndamere Token big time.  I was awarded an S at the end of the game and still no token given.

-Zenkage

replies.body: It looks like you're level 6 and already have max tokens for Tryndamere.  All you have to do now is fused it in hextech crafting to level up.  Congrats!
I have 2 tokens and need 3 to level it. please fix this.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FHe9dEMF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-16T18:15:49.436+0000)
>
> It looks like you're level 6 and already have max tokens for Tryndamere.  All you have to do now is fused it in hextech crafting to level up.  Congrats!

7 feels like a weard # to leave mastery on. Will there be a mastery 8
